definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: The riot police started to crack down on them.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察开始对他们采取镇压行动。

sentences.english: Riot police hurled tear gas canisters and smoke bombs into the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察向人群中投掷了催泪瓦斯罐和烟幕弹。

sentences.english: On our way we have seen anti-riot police taking positions in major intersections.
sentences.chinese: 在路上我们看到有很多防暴警察。

sentences.english: Several youth threw stones at police before riot police moved in to break up the protests.
sentences.chinese: 数名年轻人朝赶来驱散示威者的防暴警察投掷了石块。

sentences.english: Some threw stones at riot police.
sentences.chinese: 有人向防暴警察投掷石块。

sentences.english: They were met by black-clad police with helmets, face masks and small round riot shields.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察，全副武装，青衣面甲，手执圆盾。

sentences.english: Dozens of police, including riot police, were deployed ahead of the rally.
sentences.chinese: 大量的警察包括防暴警察在示威人群前面排开。

sentences.english: Their scuffle was stopped by the riot police.
sentences.chinese: 他们的殴斗被防暴警察制止了。

sentences.english: Riot police run after students during an anti-government rally in Valparaiso, on August 9, 2011. (Reuters/Eliseo Fernandez)
sentences.chinese: 瓦尔帕莱索，反政府集会中，防暴警察追赶学生。

sentences.english: Riot police eventually broke up the demonstrations with water cannons and tear gas.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察用水炮和催泪瓦斯驱散了示威活动。

sentences.english: Police in riot gear dispersed the crowd but made no arrests.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察驱散了人群但没有逮捕闹事球迷。

sentences.english: Riot police quickly emerged from the shadows to beat protesters with batons.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察迅速从阴影中冲出来，用警棍殴打抗议者。

sentences.english: The disturbance was repressed at last by the riot police.
sentences.chinese: 骚乱最终被防暴警察镇压下来。

sentences.english: The riot police dispersed the crowd.
The riot police batoned the mob.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察用警棍打聚众闹事者。

sentences.english: We can see hundreds of anti-riot police and security forces.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以看到数百名防暴警察和安全部队。
